title: OH THE IRONY HOLY..... i am happy... i am thankful.. but I look like a complete idiot lol
body:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/RE9gzZsn-real-lux-players-use-imperial

^^^ view that thread...

ok... 


i'll wait...


got the gist of it? okay



So I just got gifted Star Guardian Lux for Christmas from my brother.

...

now notice the first thing I say in that post is "come at me bro"

then realize he has never seen any of my posts on GD and doesn't use the forums at all.

I am really grateful. but damn, I dun look like a dang fool
